casebody.data:
L.R., individually and on behalf of J.R., a minor, Plaintiffs,
v.
CAMDEN CITY PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT and John C. Oberg in his official capacity as Interim School Business Administrator and Board Secretary, Defendants. L.R., individually and on behalf of J.R., a minor, Plaintiffs,
v.
Parsippany-Troy Hills Township Public Schools District and David F. Corso in his official capacity as Records Custodian of the Parsippany-Troy Hills Township Public School District, Defendants. The Innisfree Foundation, Plaintiff,
v.
Hillsborough Township Board of Education and Aiman Mahmoud, Records Custodian, Defendants. The Innisfree Foundation, Plaintiff,
v.
Cherry Hill Board of Education and James Devereaux, Records Custodian, Defendants. M-174 September Term 2018
080333 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 18, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of J.C. and H.C. individually and o/b/o S.C., J.G. and D.G. individually and o/b/o K.C., R.H., individually and o/b/o A.H., for leave to intervene is denied.
